photos.caption: A warm welcome in Eindhoven, have a drink.
A lovely bed for short or long stay.
Kitchen with Philips coffee maker, Philips kettle and Philips toaster and refrigerator.
Always enough hand soap, shower gel and toilet paper

primary_host.about: Hi, my name is Floris and I live in Eindhoven. I'm my own boss and active in the e-commerce and entertainment industry for over a decade. My favorite holiday destinations are Berlin, Rome and Las Vegas. I love sports, culture, cooking, movies and spend time with friends and family.
primary_host.name: Floris

sectioned_description.access:
You have free access to secure WIFI after a password has been specified. You also have the use of a private kitchen in your studio, equipped with two hotplates and a fridge. There is also a Philips coffee maker, a Philips kettle and a Philips toaster in the studio's kitchen. 

In the common bathroom you will find the shower, sink, toilet, towel rack, stool,  a small bathroom table with all necessities. The bathroom door can be simple and safely locked from the inside. You share the bathroom with toilet with up to 2 other people. A Pro hair-dryer, a extra make-up mirror, shower gel and toilet paper are available in the shared bathroom.  

There are plenty of free parking spaces in a number of parking areas right in front of the door and down the street.
sectioned_description.description:
A lovely comfortable studio apartment in the district of Stratum, real close to the city center of Eindhoven. The apartment is located opposite a cosy and lively town square with several restaurants. The perfect location for a short or long stay in the design and technology capital of the Netherlands.

The health, safety and well-being of my guests is a top priority. I use stricter hygiene measures.

The studio of approximately 22 square meters is one of two luxury studio apartments on the first floor of a completely renovated and well-kept townhouse build in 1921. 

Currently, I am happy to receive guests again in one of the two luxurious Airbnb studios so that my maximum of two guests have all the space that is currently required. I use extra hygiene and the 1.5 meter guidelines. We will discuss this clearly and clearly during the personal check in. 

A lot of attention has been paid to the comfort of the bedroom, upholstery and decoration. A grand hotel bed is equipped with luxurious Walra bed linen. This lovely comfortable bed guarantees a wonderful night's sleep. 

Darkened hotel curtains provide relaxation by keeping the lights and sounds of the cosy street outside. This studio has a kitchen with all the necessary amenities and a bar with bar stools for dinning. Walra bathrobes and towels are provided for in the studio.

You do not currently share the common bathroom with toilet. Now completely private as the other duplex studio is closed. I decide to take extra hygiene measures in the bathroom. At the moment, guests should always close the bathroom door when using the bathroom, which guarantees the 1.5 meter guidelines.

You have free access to secure WIFI after a password has been specified. You also have the use of a private kitchen in your studio, equipped with two hotplates and a fridge. There is also a Philips coffee maker, a Philips kettle and a Philips toaster in the studio's kitchen. 

In the common bathroom you will find the shower, sink, toilet, towel rack, stool,  a small bathroom table with all necessities. The bathroom door can be simple and safely locked from the inside. You share the bathroom with toilet with up to 2 other people. A Pro hair-dryer, a extra make-up mirror, shower gel and toilet paper are available in the shared bathroom.  

There are plenty of free parking spaces in a number of parking areas right in front of the door and down the street.

You are warmly welcomed in an authentic hall that gives access to your own front door. Of course, personal welcome and key transfer are self-evident. Next, I would like to walk with you through the studio and answer any questions. You will find a complimentary welcome drink on the table in the room. During your stay, I regularly attend on the first floor in my studio, but please feel free to go your own way. I am available, feel free to call, email or preferably send me a message on my cell phone.

The studio is located opposite a cosy town square with several restaurants and Pand P, the former cultural center Plaza Futura. When you leave the front door, you'll be right in the lively and vibrant Stratum district. You will find a large supermarket, a solarium studio and various shops. Culture enthusiasts find on a 5-minute walk the Parktheater Eindhoven where you can enjoy theatrical performance and various other fun activities. The Parktheater is directly adjacent to the Stadswandelpark, where you can walk and enjoy the sculptures. The Van Abbemuseum is a 10-minute walk from the apartment, a leading museum of modern and contemporary art in the center of Eindhoven.

Within 15 minutes you have reached Eindhoven Airport by car. The studio is 2 km from Eindhoven Central Station, within 10 minutes you walk to the nightlife area and the city center of Eindhoven. In just 15 minutes you walk to the car-free shopping streets around the Heuvelgalerie, the Bijenkorf or Piazza Center, where all the famous stores can be found. At 100 meters from the front door opposite supermarket Albert Heijn you will find Eindhoven Heistraat bus stop where buses run on lines 11 and 17. Walk the other way, and you will find after 250 meter the bus stop Looiakkersstraat where line 7, line 117, line 317, line 318 and line 407 can be found.

Order a breakfast at the true artisan baker Renders, Subway or at a real Dutch cheese shop. You can also get your breakfast at Albert Heijn, the largest chain of supermarkets in the Netherlands. And for your dinner you do not have to go far as well, as there are plenty of eateries with attractive outdoor terraces just a few meters away. Just four house numbers down there is a delicious authentic Thai restaurant and across the street you will find a shoarma shop, a kebab shop, a snack bar, a pizza place and a cozy dining cafe.
sectioned_description.house_rules:
Subletting, drug use and illegal activities are absolutely not allowed.
Treat everything you want to use with respect:
- If you open it, close it. 
- If you turn it on, turn it off. 
- If you borrow it, return it. 
- If you break, fix it.
- If you use it, take care of it. 
- If you make a mess, clean it up.
- If you move it, put it back.

listing_expectations.added_details: Een auto parkeren kan direct voor de deur aan de straat in gratis en betaalde vakken. Fietsen kun je veilig achter een gesloten deur stallen. Je hebt toegang tot deze afgesloten buiten ruimte met je eigen sleutel.
listing_expectations.title: No parking on property

listing_expectations.added_details: We hebben een beveiligingscamera buiten op de voorgevel, gericht op de toegang tot het pand. Deze staat permanent aan.
